code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{createLink}from'@meshconnect/web-link-sdk';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MakeAPICall=()=>{const[linkToken,setLinkToken]=useState(null);const fetchData=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/makeAPIcall',{method:'POST',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Network response error');}const result=await response.json();setLinkToken(result.linkToken);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching the API',error);}};const openCatalogPopup=async()=>{try{if(linkToken){const link=createLink({clientId:process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_MESH_CLIENTID,onIntegrationConnected:data=>{console.log('Integration connected:',data);},onExit:error=>{if(error){console.error('Link exited with error:',error);}else{console.log('Link exited successfully');}}});const popup=window.open('','_blank','width=800,height=600');if(popup){link.openLink(linkToken,{container:popup});}else{throw new Error('Failed to open popup window');}}}catch(error){console.error('Error opening catalog:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchData,children:"Fetch Data"}),linkToken?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Link Token success"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{maxHeight:'300px',overflowY:'auto',border:'1px solid #ccc',padding:'10px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{whiteSpace:'pre-wrap'},children:["Link Token: ",linkToken]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:openCatalogPopup,children:"Open Catalog"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"No data fetched yet."})]});};export default MakeAPICall;
